strings.string: Must match one of these extensions
Must not match one of these extensions
File uploaded at question "%1$s" must match one of the following extensions: %2$s
File uploaded at question "%1$s" must NOT match one of the following extensions: %2$s
Uploaded file must match one of the following extensions: %s
Uploaded file must NOT match one of the following extensions: %s

Enter a list of extensions to include or exclude, clicking 'Add' after each one. To remove an extension, click the 'Del' link next to the particular extension. Do not include the full stop as part of the extension.
Name of uploaded file "%1$s" at question "%2$s" is invalid - extension must match one of the following: %3$s
Name of uploaded file "%1$s" at question "%2$s" is invalid - extension must NOT match one of the following: %3$s
